website_summaries.verdict: Lots of accessories and a cool look combine to form the best option on a budget.
pros: Three color options: black, cobalt blue, and clear
Comes with aquarium, light, and 24-inch light fixture
Convex shape provides the perfect viewing
Acrylic is 17 times stronger than glass but only a fraction of the weight, makes it easier to move
cons: Some reports of issues with the lighting system noted
Hood has components that feel flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I love this aquarium. Maybe I should to just chalk it up to bad luck, but it started leaking. I set it up the day it arrived (5 weeks ago), cycled, and literally just stocked it with 3 dwarf Indian puffers. Now I have to re-home them in the interim...these are sensitive fish, not easy to relocate, and can't live in a community aquarium. I wish it had sprung the leak before I stocked it....spending over $300 today on supplies for appropriate rehoming while I deal with the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Mischa0218

customer_reviews.title: SeaClear acrylic aquaruims
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't even consider owning anything but SeaClear aquariums. I just bought my 4th. I'm sure it's only time before they'll be a 5th. Crystal clear viewing. Easy to clean. Hold temperatures better. Best thing about them? Earthquakes won't break them. Learned my lesson the hard way with glass. With these, you just just can't go wrong. I'll be upgrading to LED lighting. The lights this takes are pretty weak and can only keep a few plants alive.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Fogel

customer_reviews.title: Want to love it but after 6 months I think I have a lemon...
customer_reviews.text: I want to love it... but it's bowing after 6 months. I am pretty sure this is an uncommon occurrence but that doesn't change the fact that my tanks bows around all sides and the top is sagging a bit. No potential for this to be the result of poor support, it's been on a dedicated stand from Petco from the beginning. Most everything else is great. easy to clean the acrylic, excellent clarity. The only design complaint is that the top piece is a bit inconveniently designed. If only it wasn't such a hassle to set up a new tank...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D

customer_reviews.title: Nice fishtank
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice fishtank. Very sturdy. The corners are seamless so it looks more elegant than a regular tank. The top is partly covered so it is more complicated to clean and scrub than a regular tank.
customer_reviews.author: Sferten

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor design, difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: They need to post more pictures to avoid returns. This is a terrible design. The tank is a completely solid structure except for two small openings at the top. This would make it nearly impossible to clean and filtration options very limited. I bought this for an aquatic turtle and there is no way this will work. Even for fish which require much less filtration this seems like an idiotic design, forget about having a filter along the side or a canister. And at $300 it's an absolute ripoff!
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful aquarium take the clear bottom plastic off the light fixture to make it the cover for the top
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful acrylic aquarium I love it the one thing that I did do was it came with a light fixture which is so ugly and cheap so I unscrewed the clear plastic part of the light fixture and that clear plastic part covers the 2 openings on my aquarium top perfectly and I just threw away the light fixture and bought a new aquarium light other than that it really is a beautiful thick acrylic aquarium!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Take it from me - these are poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The tank looks great upon setup. Then you cycle your tank and get it setup and have to do your regular maitenance. This is no big deal except literally anything and everything will scratch this surface. I’m taking a single grain of sand on your cleaning magnet will totally ruin the surface. I’m not asking for my money back - simply pointing out a poorly constructed product. Def trying Clear 4 Life next.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Great except the very cheap hood/light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice EXCEPTfor the junky hood and light they include. I detached the clear plastic light cover (which essentially covers the tank) from the rest of the hood. It's a very flimsy piece of plastic, but you can place that on top of tank and then purchase any number of GREAT and inexpensive LED lights here on Amazon and just place over top.
customer_reviews.author: Shackle Rustyford

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Completely clear and amazing view. Cutouts on top are nice. Convienant. Doesn't leak..... yet. Cons: -Entry level light. Suggest upgrading it ASAP. -3/8" (~10mm) thick Acrylic is used. This is thinner than normal. It causes the weight of the water to "push" out and bow the front and back of the tank, causing a slightly distorted view. This makes me nervous about the structural integrity of the tank for the long-term. Knowing this now I would've gladly paid $50 more for thicker Acrylic. Bottom Line: Worth the money. Great beginner tank. Constructed well. Too thin of Acrylic used.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Low quality
customer_reviews.text: My aquarium arrived broken so I never got to use it, but having been around acrylic aquariums for 40 years....this is the lowest quality I have ever seen...hence the low price. see other reviews to confirm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Special care instructions?
customer_reviews.text: This tank was gorgeous when it arrived. I am using it for a high tech aquascape and wanted a flawless view. So I opted for acrylic. I knew out scratched easily so while placing rocks and substrate I was very slow and meticulous. When it was finished I wiped the surface with a damp cloth. That was all it took to scratch the entire front of the tank. If i can't even wipe dust from my tank with a soft damp cloth then it should come with special care instructions. Super disappointed and a very costly mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Overall - Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with how this item looks and how it was shipped. As many others have said, the light that comes with this "combo" is garbage and doesn't come with a bulb. I recommend the 28-36" version of the NICREW ClassicLED Aquarium Light which is <$40. I'm also not a fan of the top of the aquarium which isn't completely open and isn't removable. It really doesn't serve a purpose other than hindering access to your tank. I was also barely able to fit a few pieces of my hardscape through the lid openings so if you have large pieces of stone/driftwood you may run into an issue.
customer_reviews.author: cowherdingjoe

customer_reviews.title: Great Aquarium!
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm partly disabled, this tank is perfect for me. Only 20 lbs which is about all I can handle without help. Also the rounded edges and bright clear acrylic make for a great aquarium. Fast shipping with excellent packaging.
customer_reviews.author: RyanUSMC

customer_reviews.title: The light hood is useless. A tank of this size needs 25 to ...
customer_reviews.text: The light hood is useless. A tank of this size needs 25 to 50 watts. It's for a 24" flourescent bulb, and I couldn't find an aquarium bulb on the internet bigger than 20 watts. And then, there isn't space for two 24" bulbs, AND they wouldn't light the ends of the aquarium, anyway. A 30" bulb would work but I couldn't fit one in the hood, after retrofitting, because the hood is too short. Very inconsiderate on the part of manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Eric The Red

customer_reviews.title: Best tank and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I have this tank for 2.5 years now and thought it's due for a positive review. Still looks beautiful as the day I received it. Like many others, I didn't care for the cover or the included light so I left it open. Also as mentioned by other reviewers, common issue as there is a slight bowing at the top toward the middle and you can see it on my second photo. There is no yellowing on the acrylic and my fishes are happy. This is my third acrylic tank and also my biggest and it's the best by far.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine K

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp, does not scratch easily, does bow a little bit - keep your surface light to contrast the dark background
customer_reviews.text: This is the best acrylic tank I have owned. I was concerned about "scratch and bow", mostly scratching but so far (over 1 year) so good. It has bowed a bit as expected but not too bad. There are no scratches and I have gotten pretty bold while keeping it clean. One thing you should know - if you choose a dark background, get lighter (white-tan) rocks. I have a Current Freshwater LED light and a Hydor Volcano bubbler with 2 angel fish, 5 red tetras, 7 neon tetras, 2 danios and 2 catfish. I have to clean at least once every other week mostly because of algae.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Quality price and fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: Love it beautiful acrylic 20 gallon aquarium. Love the corved sides of it. Got the clear one and it is so nice. Shipping was fast and shipped well packed. The only downside is that you get a cheesy light fixture with it which doesn't include a light bulb. Really??? For all the money you paid to cheap to inclued a light bulb? Anyway will be upgrading that is issue by getting an acrylic cover for the top holes and an LED light fixture. All in all love the acrylic tank minus the light fixture
customer_reviews.author: momlove

customer_reviews.title: Great tank tho
customer_reviews.text: Light tank.sleek looking. Product as described. Does not come with bulb or anything else. Pay attention to the measurements. Great tank tho.im not a big fan of the blue but that was what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Outdated Lighting in Hood But Nice Aquarium
customer_reviews.text: I've had this aquarium for a little over a month now and have found it impossible to find the 15" T8 light bulb that is required. How can this seller still be using a light fixture from 20 years ago? The only bulb you might be able to find is a day glo or full sun - actinics are simply not available anywhere in 15". For the cost of this 20 gallon tank, a more modern light must be included. Bottom line is that you will need to spend close to another $100 to purchase and retrofit different lighting into the hood. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bagheri

customer_reviews.title: Very nice aquarium; lighter than the glass versions; curved edges.
customer_reviews.text: After one month, we can say the aquarium is working very well. Benefits are the lighter than glass aquarium and curved edges. The top opening is designed for the light (w/o bulb) housing. Rear cut outs service the filter and air hoses. Cautions: the space for top access is limited. There is little room for a heat lamp or algae UV filter if needed. The lamp case fits perfectly, but a different lamp style would certainly work as well. Remember that it is acrylic and subject to scratches; be careful cleaning the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Bill8811

customer_reviews.title: IT AINT 40 GALLONS -- THAT IS A LIE
customer_reviews.text: I PUT IN 35 GALLONS AND WITH AN INCH OF SAND ON THE BOTTOM ITS ONLY ABOUT 1/4 TO 1/3 FULL.. SUCH BULLCRAP.
customer_reviews.author: Pantsman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking tank. I wanted acrylic because it is lighter and stronger, and there are no seam lines down the sides. The light housing it comes with is not the best- it is a standard florescent housing and I wanted LED. I took the clear plastic bottom cover of the light housing off, and use that with an LED light I purchased separately. Unfortunately I had a fish jump out of the tank- the holes on the back are larger than my accessories (heater, filter). Now I leave the container of food over the heater hole to prevent it from happening again. Overall, I would recommend this tank.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: way over priced! Stars don't address the issues of importance.
customer_reviews.text: Rounded corners were a hit. The top openings are uncomfortable to clean tank poor design/ location. The hood was a joke I bought a new one the next day. Only then did I see a big sunken bow in the tank. The top and watermarks make this very noticeable and downright ugly with the light shining through the bottom of both hoods. Looks good on paper but junk! Warped. Flimsy hood and lousy egress for cleaning etc. Would not buy this tank. I hope you don't either. PS I couldn't figure out why I could not keep the tank clear, well it is the Tank that's not clear! B
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: An acrylic aquarium seemed like a better option as it was lighter and less ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this online as I live in rural Alaska and have no other options for pet supplies. An acrylic aquarium seemed like a better option as it was lighter and less prone to being destroyed in shipping. When it arrived I was pleasantly surprised to see that it was of good, solid construction and packed well. Now that I have it stocked with fish and live plants I can definitely say that it was worth the extra money as it is crystal clear and just as good -if not better- than a glass aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: jculber

customer_reviews.title: Love this tank
customer_reviews.text: A really beautiful tank when set up. But beware the integrated top makes it more difficult to work with as far as inside cleaning goes and also netting fish. The center cutout was large enough to get a sizeable decoration (large rock with plants attached) inside. HOB filter cutout is not large enough to accommodate both a power filter and a skimmer alongside it making it unusable for salt water. This was disappointing as I bought it with the idea of eventually converting to a salt water tank.
customer_reviews.author: nancya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful with few adjustments
customer_reviews.text: I like the light weight of this tank. Easy to move around however the slots on top is limited in space so large rocks or driftwood size needs to be measured before purchasing to make sure it’ll fit the slots. I didn’t bother with the provided fluorescent hood and instead just bought a nicrew LED light that is more practical and has more lighting options as well as intensity. Careful not to bump or put sharp objects on top as acrylic easily scratches and the scratches are very noticeable because of the crystal clear acrylic. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Hanzy

customer_reviews.title: Flexing or Bowing?
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice aquarium very clear and looks fancy, but the light fixture is outdated and useless and is too heavy for the slim top. I returned it after a week because it was bowing front and back , I don't think it holds 50 gallons of water is more like 40ish.. they have to check their quality control a little better.
customer_reviews.author: yackson carmona

customer_reviews.title: 3rd broken aquarium
customer_reviews.text: 3rd tank in a row all broken. What a waste of time. Packages horribly for a large fragile item. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tam2005

customer_reviews.title: First time trying an Acrylic tank and I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful aquarium! Really pleased with the look of the acrylic tank over the traditional glass. My only gripe is that it took several attempts to get one delivered undamaged. The first two showed up badly cracked due to mishandling during shipping. They should really be shipped with better packaging protection. Anyway, my fish and I couldn't be happier with the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W.

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I did not receive the clear one
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was purchasing the clear aquarium, but when it arrived it had the blue background. I'm so glad I did not receive the clear one, because the blue really adds a lot of contrast and hides all tubes and wires behind the aquarium. The acrylic is really clear.
customer_reviews.author: Keys Please!

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, with it being acrylic, how you clean it, maintain it is important, but it is the best for clarity and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Scratches very easily
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but be warned, scratches extremely easy which ruins the whole view. Dont use a magnent cleaner if you have gravel in the tank. It will get caught in the magnent and glass and scratch the heck out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Epstein didnt kill himself

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: After few months the top part near filter become mid-shaped and then light no longer fits. Inside of acrylic becomes slightly foggy white and cannot see the fish as clear.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Stamm

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank w Fixture - no light bulb
customer_reviews.text: False advertising, no light included. Everything else seems to be slightly different than other reviews, for the price I expected to get the bulb not just a light fixture I have to buy a bulb for. Very annoying, but I was able to find a bulb at my local fs for $9 so not too bad. The tank top is fused on the one I got has three holes, one very large one more a slot and another a small hole like for a heater. For me it works well, but if you want an open top not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Received broken and unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Received cracked and unusable. Unboxed after return date expired. None of the packaging damaged or the foam inside. Must have been packed already broken. $250.00 down the drain! Never again
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B. Holley

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend getting an underwater filter with tank
customer_reviews.text: With how the light sits the water from the filter was slowly running to the sides and creating puddles of water on top of the tank that needs to be wiped off daily to prevent running down the sides. Would recommend getting an underwater filter with tank
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bramble

customer_reviews.title: Upset
customer_reviews.text: Very upset no bulbs ,no pump nor filter ,was suppose to be led lighting,definitely not worth almost 200,I could have went to Walmart and purchased the complete set up with everything included for the same price, I don't think I'll be spending any more money, cause this not worth what I paid .
customer_reviews.author: Shedrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank, cheap top.
customer_reviews.text: The acrylic tank is SO NICE then they top it off with the cheap plastic top? Really? This product would have a perfect review if SeaClear thoroughly committed to providing an excellent product rather than cheating at the finish line. I'm not impressed and I'm hoping I can find a better top that fits the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived broken in multiple places, not returnable
customer_reviews.text: material is secured with a sticky paper, so broken pieces did not rattle around. I didn't plan to set it up for a few months, so when I opened it, the return deadline gone. Return deadlines are way too short, and Amazon should know how to package fragile items at this point, pretty discouragingly poor performance.
customer_reviews.author: sarah miller

customer_reviews.title: No bulb included
customer_reviews.text: The aquarium itself is well made, doesn't leak. Disappointed that there was no bulb included with the light asby. If you can find a different light, led type order it. The bulb required is not stocked by your Mom & Pop Pet Store nor your local hardware store which makes it a special order. Waited another week now for the bulb to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Southerner

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy until you know about lid and junk light
customer_reviews.text: The lid is already attached with holes for equipment were they think it should be. This needs to be recut in order to fit the my equipment. If I wasn't a carpenter with a jigsaw I would send it back because of the foolish way they cut slots for equipment. There isn't even room to put in large decorations. I'll have to cut that bigger too. The light is for one lightbulb, not included. Complete piece of junk. This tank is just far overpriced plastic. It's also going to be a nightmare to clean because the pre-cut hole up top is so small. This was designed by a manufacturer on a computer not an aquarist !!
customer_reviews.author: quick rick

customer_reviews.title: Great Aquarium
customer_reviews.text: I've had many aquariums but never an acrylic just the view inside is like going to HD from glass didn't want a big tank this time around over all I'm quite pleased and I was spared the sticker people were complaining about
customer_reviews.author: A Tabish

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Tank... almost
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tank.Light weight is a plus. The clarity and mirror image can not be beat. Only gave 4 stars because of the light fixture they supply and the fact there is not a bulb included.A high quality tank like this deserves to have a newer led style set up. I cut the clear piece of there good to fill the gaps
customer_reviews.author: Rob C.

customer_reviews.title: My first acrylic tank
customer_reviews.text: I love how it’s much lighter no blind spots to viewing the tank some people complain about the light fixture which is ok not great by a good bulb and you’ll be ok it sits right in the two cutouts on top of the tank I would give a 9 out of 10 with the lighting being my most disliked thing because I wanted a blue and daylight option
customer_reviews.author: Dame

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you must
customer_reviews.text: Totally in love with this tank for the most part. It is well built. but it is a pain for putting anything but water in it as the way the top is designed it limits what size of anything you can put into it. Nice idea but for what it costs nah they could do better
customer_reviews.author: Ole’

customer_reviews.title: Don't wipe the outside with just any material. It will leave micro-scratches.
customer_reviews.text: I invested in an acrylic tank after my 55 gallon glass shattered in the middle of the night for no apparent reason. The best part of this tank is how light it is, about 30 lbs. The cut-outs in the top also fit every filter/heater I tried on, and all the decorative elements fit through. It would have to be absurdly large to not fit. It's crystal clear and the blue backing really sets off the brightness of my cichlids. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Heather cochrane

customer_reviews.title: It really does look amazing! Very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it showed up broken, sent it back for replacement, that also showed up broken.. I had already bought a stand for it and it really is the one I wanted, so I crossed my fingers and bought it again. 3rd times a charm. It really does look amazing! Very happy with the quality. I was tempted to give less stars due to the shipping, but I'm an easy going guy, wasn't in a hurry and realize that seamless acrylic can be fragile during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love my new aquarium, I replaced the light with a Finnex planted light and just used the clear portion of the hood to cover the top. I used an aqua clear 30 HOB filter and an air stone on the side. I love looking at my aquarium, just waiting for the cycle to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Godsell

customer_reviews.title: Really nice unit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tank, I went with it because it was sider and less tall than other 40 gallon options, really nice quality and the curved sides are a nice touch, my blue gill is loving all the extra room =)
customer_reviews.author: Javad Shadzi

customer_reviews.title: Good tank
customer_reviews.text: It's a good visibility for not being glass. I've not scratched it yet even with rubbing and scraping the alge off. The top being attached to the thing is understandable but annoying. But can clean and put all your gadgets on it without much problem. The holes are quite large.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bertinazzi

customer_reviews.title: I was sent a broken tank with the box dented up and 2 days later the replacement tank arrived in perfect condition. They were fast
customer_reviews.text: Stunning tank. I've gotten so many compliments. My family just stares at it. I was sent a broken tank with the box dented up and 2 days later the replacement tank arrived in perfect condition. They were fast! Got it right in time for Christmas. Pros: Light Large near seamless edge Very clear Beautiful Fish are happy Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Brady G. McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Extremely underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: The hood that came with the aquarium is pure garbage - for the price of this aquarium the light bulb should have been included - and the fluorescent bulb is impossible to find! Also the hood does not even attach to the aquarium at all! I expected more for this price - very dis satisfied in the POS.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank. Very clear. Very lightweight. Just make sure you have support under the whole bottom. Not just around the sides. It WILL BREAK.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa B

customer_reviews.title: Good Size
customer_reviews.text: I like the tank a lot, the problem is finding the proper sized stand for it. This size is very tricky and it is just too difficult to find a stand thst holds the heaviness of the tank while keeping the same dimensions of the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Alaa

customer_reviews.title: An aquarium survived shipping!  Amazing packing job Amazon. Great aquarium, super light, and no faults in the seams.
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical of an aquarium surviving shipping. It came through perfectly. Amazing packing job Amazon. Great aquarium, super light, and no faults in the seams.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great tank, but why do they lie to us.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tank.....I love it, but be aware that it is only 39 gallons even though it is advertised as being a 50 which is an outright falsehood. This is important because you may overcrowd your tank thinking it is a 50. 36x20x15=10,800 cubic inches divided by 277 (# of cubic inches in a gallon) = 38.9
customer_reviews.author: Ray Lucas

customer_reviews.title: It's a very solid tank and my mother is in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tank for my mother for Christmas. It's a very solid tank and my mother is in love with it. Her one complaint is that the unit is one piece and the top of the tank can't be opened, so any cleaning that needs to be done with it have to be done through the provided holes, which will make it a little tricky. All things considered she's absolutely thrilled with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Haas

customer_reviews.title: very pretty presentatoin
customer_reviews.text: I like the tank itself, but the bulb I put in (not included) actually caught fire when water leaked in. I bought a 36 dollar light with the blue and white dots and that has worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Hangarter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tank
customer_reviews.text: I love this aquarium and would give it 5 stars, but the lid/light they put on it is just a total waste of money. It had to be replaced with an LED light, so that is a lot of wasted money for me. They need to catch up with the rest of the industry and put LEDs on their aquariums.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So amazingly crystal clear, it is worth every single penny of the added expense compared to glass
customer_reviews.text: added bonus is the top has only one smallish opening exposed when the light is over the main openings, which keeps my stupid cat from ending up in the tank. I have had it running and stocked with fish for over 2 months now, and it is as crystal clear and beautiful as it was day one. Everyone who has seen it has been blown away by how spectacular it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: very light,very clear.
customer_reviews.text: awsome product,you can pick it up with one hand.beautiful clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: The aquarium was not damaged and it is up and running beautifully. Thank you. It will be a theme piece for my middle school math class in our virtual learning this fall. We will enjoy the goldfish while we solve ratios, proportions, geometry, pre-algebraic equations, and inequalities. We will calculate angles, area of hexagons, and volume of a hexagonal prism...all around this fish tank!
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! It does bow a bit out in ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! It does bow a bit out in the center on the front and back but that's to be expected of acrylic. I thought it was cracked when I first got it but noticed all 4 corners had it in the same place, turns out to be where they finished the sealing. I pay a little more attention to detail than most which is the only reason I noticed it. Doesn't bother me any!
customer_reviews.author: Maka

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: The fish tank is completely destroyed and the box is damaged. It’s literally in pieces. There was NO foam provided to protect the tank. Unacceptable. I can’t believe this item was packaged in a way that guaranteed damage.
customer_reviews.author: mishi

customer_reviews.title: The aquarium is very light but sturdy and clear so far
customer_reviews.text: The aquarium is very light but sturdy and clear so far. The light is on the cheap side, and seems a bit fragile, so i'm just replacing it with another. overall, I would say that compared to glass, it is a big improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic! Some glue marks along top edges
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 29 gal with this one. Looks fantastic! Some glue marks along top edges, but doesn't take away from presentation of unit. It's a QC thing where it's made. I'd buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Myers

customer_reviews.title: Due to sides bulging, thin top bulging inward
customer_reviews.text: Top is restricted, and the cutouts for you to reach into the tank plus the cutout for the HOB filter combined, causes a weak spot on the acrylic making it bend. Other than that I don’t know if there is a diff between the clarity of acrylic vs glass, the way it was hyped about on various websites, maybe i’ll see it further down the road?!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonY_U_BanMe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The tank itself is very beautiful, clean lines and clear view. Very appealing to the eye. The drawback, and its a big one, is the tank is paired with a very inferior light. In fact, I had to buy a bulb to put in it. Then plugged it in and it began stinking like burning plastic and could not be used.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! High quality! AAA+++
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations! This looks looks beautiful and I love the seamless front edges. The quality is superb. Also, the sand ‘look’ on the bottom makes it look as if you have gravel down without the mess of cleaning it. Very light and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ally's Mom

customer_reviews.title: This came with no blue sapphire background.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it specifically for shown background, it came clear.
customer_reviews.author: Janice R. Pariza

customer_reviews.title: I love this tank!
customer_reviews.text: great fish tank, so much lighter then glass and the top is practically seal to keep moister in! But I did have to drill two small holes in the top for my power head pump wires on the right side so they don't hang down.You can see it in picture!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Akers

customer_reviews.title: great small tank
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tank to stick in a small place that will make a big impact. The filter on it works really well. It's easy to put everything together. The only downfall is the light on this tank. We replaced it with a LED strip from Lowes. the lid is not hinged you have to lift it off every time you need to feed the fish or to do anything in the tank. There's a small lid on the inside that you just left off to add fish or water.
customer_reviews.author: IslandMom

customer_reviews.title: Someone mentioned the top cover looks and feels like wood. That is sticky protective paper which you ...
customer_reviews.text: Someone mentioned the top cover looks and feels like wood. That is sticky protective paper which you peel off; Its all plastic. The Filter is an excellent Bio filter which has 3 different stages. The light does stink I will not put on the black top cover. Like someone said buy a small LED light and don't use the top black cover and you have a great tank!
customer_reviews.author: star123

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Had to drill a hole so a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Had to drill a hole so a lily pipe could blow water from left to right, not from back to front.
customer_reviews.author: Xeon[13]

customer_reviews.title: Loving this aquarium! I have 3 full grown blood ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this aquarium! I have 3 full grown blood parrots in it, and theres plenty of room. Not too sure about the design of the top though. Makes it a bit harder to clean
customer_reviews.author: tina bloomfield

customer_reviews.title: This is a great aquariums!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great aquariums and was preferred for me This aquarium had the quality that was desired and it was well packaged and delivered as promised. The receiver is very pleased with this aquarium and has stocked it well with a beautiful habitat for existing fish which now seem very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and modern looking. I bought a different light for a cleaner look and as recommended by previous reviewers. Definately recommend (and will most likely get a larger for fancy goldfishes)
customer_reviews.author: Hazelnut

customer_reviews.title: Great tank but it needs better air circulation on top
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tank. Only cons is that it's too closed on the top not allowing too much air circulation which trends to increase the water temperature. I have to use a fan to increase air circulation and down the water temperature but it increases water evaporation too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tank!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an intermediate knowledgeable fresh water enthusiast. I learn from the internet and comments posted by other users. I ordered this tank to replace a 29 gallon glass and simply love, love, love the look. It took some time getting my fish over, but they all seem to be happy swimmers! What amazes me is the clarity of the water thru the acrylic.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Gal

customer_reviews.title: Nice, oddly-shaped tank. Large viewing windows
customer_reviews.text: I love this weird thing. I move a lot so it is light weight for that exact purpose. Easy to find decals for the background
customer_reviews.author: Rae H

customer_reviews.title: Ugly light hood
customer_reviews.text: Good looking when set up the downfall is the bulky light/lid it covers the whole opening so you have to move it for feeding or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: ... just opened it yesterday and I wasn't expecting how nice it was
customer_reviews.text: I just opened it yesterday and I wasn't expecting how nice it was. It's awesome. I'm waiting on the stand so I will review again after I have it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Murray

customer_reviews.title: Will not crack , Break or leak
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase . Very easy to set up ! Very light and the fish seem very happy !
customer_reviews.author: Anthony USA

customer_reviews.title: Seamless design
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely fantastic! It however did come chopped on the bottom, but it wasn’t even an issue. It looks stunning and everyone that comes into my house loves it. It is a little hard to clean it up as the top of aquarium is quite constrained but it is overall a really nice looking tank.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - Do not purchase!  Light caught on fire
customer_reviews.text: The light burnt out after two weeks. I was able to exchange the aquarium, however the light caught on fire yesterday. I would not recommend this aquarium kit to ANYONE. Fortunately we were home when it caught fire. I know have to look for alternative lighting for this tank. Very disappointed, especially considering what I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Milke

customer_reviews.title: Wtf kind of lightbulb does this take? No way to know!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come with a lightbulb, no where in the directions does it say what size or type of fluorescent light bulb it takes, and the phone number it says to call doesn’t work. I have had this over a week and still can’t figure fire out what on earth I’m supposed to put in it. Apparently not a T8 24 inch. Maybe not a T8 at all. Seems to be a different thing. What thing? Who knows !
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Catrett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful aquarium, the only problem i had was the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful aquarium, the only problem i had was the way it was shipped, a lot of tape was used to secure the hood light inside the tank, very difficult to get off, otherwise very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie D

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected it is not rectangle
customer_reviews.text: It wanted to it to be like the previous 50 gals I have. Not even close check the dimensions first, like I didn't
customer_reviews.author: Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband. It’s crystal clear and my husband LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Star White

customer_reviews.title: Very clear and easy to see through
customer_reviews.text: First one came damaged (top was busted), but company sent another one quickly. Very clear and easy to see through. Corners are slightly rounded, which makes it less of a "hazard" as far as people walking by and bumping it and hurting themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Lighting fixture
customer_reviews.text: Other purchasers are right. The light fixture is like the quality of plastic used by restaurants for take home food. The aquarium itself is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Carreon

customer_reviews.title: Happy fish
customer_reviews.text: My fish are happy. 40 gallons weighs enough without having a glass tank.
customer_reviews.author: Debby D

customer_reviews.title: Love how clear
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my nearly 40 year old glass aquarium when it sprung a leak. Love how clear and light it is.
customer_reviews.author: GPSquare

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fish tank
customer_reviews.text: Loved the tank eventhough I received an octagon one instead of the one I ordered. We decided to keep it and have been enjoying it since.
customer_reviews.author: PW Perkins

customer_reviews.title: i love it but the lite is cheap
customer_reviews.text: i love it but the lite is cheap,thanks to youtube i did a 3d background.I think it came out nice the light is a beamworks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: big and light
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for the fishes in this house, so it’s better you can’t imagine
customer_reviews.author: ALEKSANDR SHATAYLO

customer_reviews.title: acrylic is where it's at
customer_reviews.text: acrylic gives me a piece of mind, esp for such a large aquarium. So far no complaints. it's excellent and much lighter than glass
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged on the corner. I had to get it filled it with resin myself to fix it. I would like to get a partial refund for this order.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Turner

customer_reviews.title: beautiful aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Worth the wait and then the first shipment was lost by Fed X UPS delivered a replacement ASAP! Very nice and very good quality aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: Sakitulo

customer_reviews.title: So nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fish tank! It’s beautiful to look at from all angles.
customer_reviews.author: KitchenKutter

product_meta.title: SeaClear Acrylic Aquarium Combo Set
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:20 gal Deluxe HexagonWhen quality determines the choice, the choice is clear: SeaClear. No one can match the quality of SeaClear's virtually invisible seams, which are backed up by the industry's most extensive warranty. For the discerning aquarist for whom nothing but the best will do, SeaClear can make even the most extreme aquatic dreams come true. Product Features: *Combo means: the aquarium, reflector and electrical 15" light fixture are all included * Acrylic is clearer than glass fish tanks * Acrylic is 17 times Stronger than Glass * Weighs half the weight than glass * More Impact Resistant making it less prone to chipping or cracking than glass, making it safer around children and pets * Safe for Salt and Freshwater * The Hexagon shape is a tranquil design * This SeaClear Aquarium is beautiful and you won't believe how your fish and decorations will pop when viewing your aquarium.
feature_bullets: Combo includes aquarium, reflector and electrical 12" light fixture
Tranquil Hexagon design; You won't believe how your fish and decorations will pop!
Acrylic aquariums are clearer than glass, 17 times stronger, and only half the weight!
More impact resistant and less prone to chipping or cracking than glass, making it safer around children and pets

specifications.Manufacturer: Pet Partners dba North American Pet
